data.text:
When you’re looking for the best getaway destination, it doesn’t get any better than this. Start planning today with our flexible travel options.
https://t.co/UgxKPESdFb https://t.co/gcoQiMpPUX
Starting October 14, fly nonstop from Tijuana to Cancun on our newest route!https://t.co/cTApycpm5O https://t.co/n0H0IuBCPv

When we serve you, we do it from the heart. We know you can’t see our smile right now, that’s why instead we’ll show you our heart. 
Welcome aboard 💙 https://t.co/cDnc7kDzBE
The Mexican Caribbean has the jewel-toned waters are white sandy beaches that you've been dreaming of all year long. 🌴 https://t.co/kae74vi3NP

data.text:
Are you ready for a new adventure? Travel to Mexico City with our amazing deals.
https://t.co/Ct4F32toCO https://t.co/36mIAlpvqI
Tell us what year you were born and we’ll tell you what aircraft you are! ✈️
Stretch out in our Clase Premier and experience the ultimate comfort at 30,000ft. https://t.co/BYS8bMnYiT https://t.co/OXqUfNT4F4
We know you can’t see our smile right now; so instead, we’ll show you our hearts. #TogetherWeKeepFlying https://t.co/wuuZD2M8zW

Did you know that all our aircraft have HEPA filters that eliminate 99.99% of viruses and bacteria? Fly safely with our Health and Sanitization Management System. https://t.co/g1yH4JSLoK https://t.co/zGqanCP3RW
